channel.title: Updated bluurs client release
channel.description:
I made a updated bluurs client.
It has still some buggs like magic But idk how to fix :p So Please Dont Flame this Is my First Client
Features new 503 magic 508 prayer 508 attack tab 508 (Remade) emotes,option tab Friends,ignorge tabs fixed Hp bar added Right click Fixed the cache Added much new intrfaces Added welcome screen(to client) and ehm 508 npcs 508 character design Some new 508 ints for items added smaller hp bar Clients load faster And more just download it
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Im Still busy with fixing buggs i think tomorow i fixed all bugs and im still busy with adding more stuff :p
So pictures/Vids: I got only 1 picture and 4 vids
New Npcs (ALL NPCS): [URL=http://img269.imageshack.us/i/newnpcs.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/3950/newnpcs.th.png[/img][/URL]
Vids: 508 characters: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2rhth5c&s=4 508 Hp bar: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2m2gl7b&s=4 Right click: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=28gxetg&s=4 New interfaces: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2mgp6pu&s=4
Credits: Me For the rest Bluur For making bluurs Shkic For Editing the old bluurs DemisePking For 508 models ;)
LINKS: http://www.multiupload.com/LFE71PAOI5 http://rapidshare.com/files/304017912/Bluurrs_client_modifed_by_johnny.rar.html http://www.zshare.net/download/6817023393cf14bc/ http://depositfiles.com/en/files/xb3glthii http://www.2shared.com/file/9010692/b851f593/Bluurrs_client_modifed_by_johnny.html http://hotfile.com/dl/16970766/8b35da8/Bluurrs_client_modifed_by_johnny.rar.html http://www.mediafire.com/?yxmnog2ndij http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0FCNCVU3

item.title: Updated bluurs client release
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

billyjr33:

This looks nice man and two tips if your going to make a v2 one you should try and find out how to fix the magic thing and fix the agility because all bluur clients dont have working agility because its half missing but nice work man.

Thanks But i think i will not make a v2 cause bluurs is not a very stable client.

Kalvin:

Not bad. Good work

Thanks you

Read full topic
